pullRequest.title: HDDS-4416. Update README.md after TLP separation
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Update README.md with the TLP information
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-4416
How was this patch tested?
Text only change. 👀

commit.message: HDDS-4416. Update README.md after TLP separation
